Name: Name of the Director
Text: The person who made the video.

Name: Name of the person submitting
Text: The following person is responsible for the accuracy of the information given in this form and shall be informed about the selection result.

Name: Year of completion
Text: Please note that submitted works must have been completed in 2023 or after.

Name: Length (in minutes)
Text: Submitted works should be no longer than 15 minutes.

Name: Short synopsis
Notes: up to 150 words, 800 characters with space

Name: Categories
Notes: Options: Documentary, Experimental, Animation, Narrative, LGBTQAI+, other → then text field

Name: Explicit
Text:
We will be showing works across a kindergarten. Please indicate whether your work contains any of the following elements: 

- Nudity
- Sexual content
- Blood/Violence
- Epilepsi triggers
- Strong language
- Disturbing/triggering imagery
- Other → what
Notes: if yes than ‘What is explicit?’ is mandatory

Name: AI
Text: For transparency purposes, was AI used in any way for the making of this film?

Name: AI Explanation
Text: If yes, please tell us in a short text how AI was used:

Name: Additional info
Text: Anything else that needs to be known about the creation process

Name: Previous Screenings
Text: Has the film been or will it be presented at other festivals?
Notes: If yes then mandatory to say where

Name: Link to watch
Text: Needs to be accessible until the start of the festival

Name: Link to download
Text: So we can screen. Please provide a file with english subtitles.

Name: Screenshots
Text: Please attach up to 5 screenshots/film stills from your work.

Name: Cast and Crew
Text: People involved in the projects and their roles. For example, John Doe - Rigger

Name: Special screening requirements
Text: Please let us know if your work has any special technical or spatial requirements for presentation (e.g., multi-channel sound, specific volume levels, unusual aspect ratio, looping instructions, external files, physical objects).

Name: Terms and conditions
Text:
- Please make sure that all information given above is correct.
- Accept we use this info, including the screenshots when promoting the festival, whether for non-commercial or commercial endeavors.
- No usage of copywritten material.
- It’s our property to show within the festival
